name: Miner
description: You worked in the mines before you immigrated to New England.  Even though you couldn't find a job, you kept your flashlight, tool belt, and hardhat.  Looks like they'll come in handy.

name: Spelunker
description: You always liked going into caves and exploring around, and when the cataclysm hit you were lucky enough to be coming back from a trip.

name: Cowboy
description: You always wore a 10-Gallon hat, and now your trusty revolver might just save you from the zombies.  "And ain't no sidewindin', bushwhackin', hornswagglin', cracker crooger gonna ruin my biscuit cutter!"

name: Race Car Driver
description: Although you weren't a pro, you always won against the regulars at the local track, and those driving and mechanics skills will surely be useful in a world devoid of functioning mechanics.

name: Megaman Wannabe
description: You loved the games.  You had them all.  You even went so far as to have a fusion blaster CBM installed in your arm.  And your parents said it was useless; that you'll never get to use it.  WHO'S LAUGHING NOW, HUH?

name: Power Plant Worker
description: You worked at the power plants before the Cataclysm, and your skills may come in handy later, assuming you survive first.

name: Bionic Boxer
description: A washed-up boxer, you were a sure bet until you were disqualified from the competition due to your "enhancements".  Show them that cheaters will prosper!

name: Daredevil
description: You always had to get that rush of adrenaline, and you just couldn't keep away from danger.  You'll be getting plenty of adrenaline now.

name: Bartender
description: You owned a small bar, and you loved your job.  Now that your cash flow has stopped, you may begin to take desperate measures.  Do zombies like booze?

name: Roleplayer
description: All you know is that you'd really like to be having a word with the GM of the universe.  Convince him to remove some of the zombies or at least give you a head start, you know?

name: Knight
description: By the gods! You've never seen this much destruction before.  Too bad you still don't have your horse with you.

name: T-1000
description: The Schwarzenegger-ization of the Cataclysm is now complete.

name: Bionic Guard
description: You beat out the competition with a set of bionic enhancements, making employers practically fall over themselves to hire you.  Equipped with the latest in bionic and security technology, you were prepared to handle any criminal.  Unfortunately, your job description didn't include zombies.

name: Average Joe
description: What chance could some normal guy have in this hellhole of a world? Luckily for you, you managed to grab some household items as you fled.

name: Flasher
description: Anytime you try to flash a zombie, he almost eats your brains.  It's probably wise to not get close enough to attempt to flash them, anyway.
